main.name: Software Development. Delivered.
main.description: The development of reliable and scalable software solutions for any OS, browser and device. Reduced implementation costs and timely delivery with organized development process, modern methodologies, competencies in cutting-edge technologies, and a rich pool of developers.
main.bio: BlackHole believes in a personalized approach to every customer. The selection of development practice is tailored to customer's specific business needs. Be it classical methodologies, such as Waterfall or Prototype development, or modern approaches like Agile, Kanban, Lean  or Extreme Programming, BlackHole ensures a timely delivery of the project.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

companyvalues.people: People are at the center of fundamental belief of BlackHole. To attract, hire and retain the best talents and provide first-class learning, growing & working experiances is core BlackHole value.
companyvalues.journey: The collection of moments, experiences, and memories that the team shares as we make progress: the light moments, the laughter and the team effort solve a problem.
companyvalues.progress: The continuous march toward achieving our mission as a team: the milestones, the successes, and the breakthroughs.

education.description: Enterprise Applications are large-scale enterprise software packages that support business processes, information flows, reporting, and data analytics in complex organizations. BlackHole focuses on Simplicity, Overall Flexibility and Maintainability, Reusability and Decoupling of Technology and Functionality. BlackHole's proven approach of breaking large-scale application in to the small & frequent ship-able deliveries has always made sure that Enterprise Applications are developed with continuous User Feedback.

BlackHole brings to life product ideas of native, cross-platform, and hybrid mobile applications, targeting smartphones and tablets. Be it e-commerce experiance or geo-tracking of users, BlackHole has delivered such examples with ease of use. BlackHole can participate from concept screen sketching till seamless deployments of Apps to the respective app stores.

BlackHole provides flexible and seamless website development services. BlackHole's approach to design attractive and customer-friendly web designs has helped many businesses to enlarge digital footprint. BlackHole is proud of excellent team of designers & developers, which can collaborate with you during the journey of concept to website hosting.

work.description: Fill in the skill gap of in-house resources with the best BlackHole offshore talents assigned to projects full-time and managed by you directly. BlackHole provides staff augmentation services to speed up development and optimize development costs.

Expand your software development capabilities and minimize management efforts with a dedicated BlackHole development team managed by a PM from BlackHole who regularly reports to you and collaborates on all important decisions in the project.

testimonials.text: The wonderful team effort of Flatworldsolutions helped me create new hopes for my industry. With their professionalism, prompt response and courteous service, I was able to design wonderful and innovative web applications that will break new ground in the logistics industry. My experience was positive and unsurpassed. I am looking forward to develop my next project with the wonderful team at Flatworldsolutions. I truly am grateful for their presence in my professional life... Doing business has never been so efficient and so pleasant! Thank you to all of you.
testimonials.user: Cornelius Le Roux, CTO - Some Company
